Hi ..
<snipped quote>
> >I've been placed in charge of learning the concepts
> of JUnit and 
> >reporting them back to our team.
<snip>
> Are there any 
> >standards for validation or any general standards
> that anyone has 
> >incorporated in their own projects? 
<end snipped quote>

Have you seen the following articles?  They aren't
standards as such, but give you ideas about what to
aim for...
article " Testing, fun? Really? ":
http://www-106.ibm.com/developerworks/library/j-test.html

article "Incremental development with Ant and JUnit
Using unit test to improve your code in small steps"
http://www-106.ibm.com/developerworks/library/j-ant/index.html

Regards

Chris
